revision.text: ==The Three Golems== '''Note:''' After fulfilling the prerequisites, this quest can be accepted in the Bulletin Board in [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Littleroot Town]]. {| class="wikitable" |+ The Three Golems ! Type !! Requirement !! Reward |- | Prerequisite || Beat [[Gyms#Hoenn|Mossdeep City]]'s Gym || N/A |- | Clear Dungeon || Clear [[Sealed Chamber]] || N/A |- | Talk to NPC || Investigate the Strange Markings in [[Sealed Chamber]] || N/A |- | Talk to NPC || Go ⠇⠑⠋⠞ || N/A |- | Talk to NPC || Go ⠇⠑⠋⠞ || N/A |- | Talk to NPC || Go ⠎⠞⠗⠁⠊⠛⠓⠞ || N/A |- | Talk to NPC || Go ⠎⠞⠗⠁⠊⠛⠓⠞ || N/A |- | Talk to NPC || Go ⠗⠊⠛⠓⠞ || N/A |- | Talk to NPC || Investigate the Hidden Message in [[Sealed Chamber]] || N/A |- | Defeat Pokémon || Defeat 100 Pokémon in ⠙⠑⠎⠑⠗⠞, ⠊⠎⠇⠁⠝⠙ and ⠁⠝⠉⠊⠑⠝⠞ || Unlocks Regirock [[File:Regirock.png|25px]], Regice [[File:Regice.png|25px]] and Registeel [[File:Registeel.png|25px]] in [[Sealed Chamber]] |- | Catch Pokémon || Capture Regirock [[File:Regirock.png|25px]], Regice [[File:Regice.png|25px]] and Registeel [[File:Registeel.png|25px]] || N/A |}
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
